20101206013541.000|20101206013543.500|CCO|LETTING THE MONEY FLOW TO GROUPS

20101206013546.000|20101206013548.500|CCO|FROM AL QAEDA TO THE TALIBAN.
20101206013548.500|20101206013551.000|CCO|A CABLE DIRECTLY FROM SECRETARY 
20101206013551.000|20101206013552.429|CCO|OF STATE HILLARY CLINTON CALLS

20101206013556.714|20101206013558.143|CCO|WORLDWIDE."

20101206013559.571|20101206013601.000|CCO|HARSHER ASSESSMENTS.

20101206013613.500|20101206013614.750|CCO|KNOWN TERRORISTS."
20101206013614.750|20101206013616.000|CCO|>> IT CONCERNS US.
20101206013616.000|20101206013617.250|CCO|IT'S A BIG PROBLEM.
20101206013617.250|20101206013618.500|CCO|AND WE'RE TRYING TO PUSH THEM 
20101206013618.500|20101206013619.750|CCO|THE BEST WE CAN.

20101206014752.250|20101206014753.500|CCO|TISSUE WITHIN TWO TO TWO AND A

20101206014754.750|20101206014756.000|CCO|>> Reporter: THEY'RE IN COMMON, 
20101206014756.000|20101206014757.250|CCO|EVERY DAY OBJECTS ALL AROUND 
20101206014757.250|20101206014758.500|CCO|YOU.
20101206014758.500|20101206014759.750|CCO|SIMPLE, ROUND, SO-CALLED BUTTON 
20101206014759.750|20101206014801.000|CCO|BATTERIES MADE OF LITHIUM.
20101206014801.000|20101206014802.667|CCO|WHEN THEY'RE ACCIDENTALLY 
20101206014802.667|20101206014804.333|CCO|INGESTED BY A YOUNG CHILD, THEY 
20101206014804.333|20101206014806.000|CCO|CAN BE DEADLY.
20101206014806.000|20101206014807.667|CCO|WHEN THE LITHIUM BATTERY BECOMES
20101206014807.667|20101206014809.333|CCO|LODGED IN THE BODY, IT GIVES OFF
20101206014809.333|20101206014811.000|CCO|AN ELECTRICAL CURRENT WHICH 
20101206014811.000|20101206014813.500|CCO|REACTS WITH SURROUNDING ISSUE, 
20101206014813.500|20101206014816.000|CCO|PRODUCING A STRONG ACID, SIMILAR
20101206014816.000|20101206014818.500|CCO|TO A HOUSEHOLD DRAIN OPENER.
20101206014818.500|20101206014821.000|CCO|>> IT CAN CAUSE A HOLE INTO THE 
20101206014821.000|20101206014822.667|CCO|TRACHEA AND IN CHILDREN WHERE 
20101206014822.667|20101206014824.333|CCO|THIS HAS HAPPENED, THEY CAN LOSE

20101206014826.000|20101206014827.667|CCO|DIE.
20101206014827.667|20101206014829.333|CCO|>> Reporter: ABOUT 3,500 CASES 
20101206014829.333|20101206014831.000|CCO|OF BUTTON CELL BATTERY INGESTION

20101206014832.429|20101206014833.857|CCO|CONTROL CENTERS.
20101206014833.857|20101206014835.286|CCO|13 CHILDREN HAVE DIED.
